alert.note: Alert for Monroe (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 27 at 7:30PM EDT until further notice by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia... Towaliga River at GA 83 near Juliette affecting Monroe County. For the Ocmulgee River Basin...including Jackson, Griffin, Juliette, Juliette, Dames Ferry, Macon, Macon, Hawkinsville, Byron, Clinchfield, Hawkinsville, Abbeville, McRae, Scotland, Lumber City... Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Towaliga River at GA 83 near Juliette. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 18 feet, Minor flooding expands into woodlands and fields upstream and downstream from the gage on Monticello Highway or Georgia Highway 83. Portions of Byars Road and numerous private access roads near the river will flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:45 PM EDT Monday the stage was 19.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 6:45 PM EDT Monday was 19.1 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 16 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
